inclusion.criterion: Patients diagnosed with ET by the Consensus Statement on the Classification of Tremors, From the Task Force on Tremor of the International Parkinson and Movement Disorder Society.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Lack of capacity to consent to participate in the project.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Wilson disease, which is a type of ET. However, there is no mention of lack of capacity to consent.
